statements: DELETE FROM security_alerts WHERE camera_id = 3 AND alert_type = 'Motion Detection';
DELETE FROM security_alerts WHERE camera_id = 2 AND sensor_id = 3;
DELETE FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Fire' AND capture_time > '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM camera_logs WHERE event_type = 'Motion Detected' AND event_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'motion' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 123 AND notification_type = 'security' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
